item.description: If you are curious about near death or out of body experiences, or if you've had an experience that you'd like to explore, you may really enjoy this meetup. Of course, you're welcome to just come and listen, too. We'll be discussing the nature of ourselves as Soul and our ability to move out of physical consciousness at will. Plus we'll share a safe Soul Travel technique for use in the dream state or in a contemplation. We look forward to meeting you! Sincerely, Isa and Bob

group.name: The Central Connecticut Spiritual Experiences Group

item.name: Near Death and Out of Body Experiences
